author: dbertoni
msg: Cleaned up some some argument names and unnecessary code.

author: rpluem
msg: * The previous pool implementation used a less fine grained locking
mechanism. If it was not provided with a separate allocator
it used the parent allocator for locking.
Use the still present allocator argument to apr_pool_create_ex to
determine the correct level of granularity: If no allocator is passed
in use the mutex from the parent instead of creating a new one by

author: mturk
msg: Query the mpm state and clear the running flag if mpm is stopping.

msg: Fixes for building on Solaris with Sun Workshop and STLport 4.
